```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
dollar_store_data=read_excel("C:/Users/srika/Downloads/salesgenie_dollar_stores.xlsx")
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = dollar_store_data, aes(x = Company_Name, fill = Location_Sales_Volume_Range)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge")
ggplotly(p)
```
